channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report E-2025070416
item.description:
Report E-2025070416

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-07-08
  • City: OMAHA
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 8, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN1993 was punctured in transit and released its full contents to the trailer interior and pavement below. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Works, Inc. (EWI) to remediate the impacted site. The crew containerized the damaged drum in one (1) 85-gallon drum. EWI utilized absorbents and hand tools to collect all impacted materials in two (2) 55-gallon drums.

item.title: Report X-2025061803
item.description:
Report X-2025061803

Identified by scraper @ 2025-07-23T00:58:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-06-23
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING GROUND PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A ONE GALLON JUG OF METHYLENE CHLORIDE LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 850A77, STAMPS GROUND SAVER, 1990 E GRAND AVE, EL SEGUNDO CA 90245-5013.
